name: Uber-Planetary
description:
Uber-Planetary was a project developed as a 4-month project capstone project for the Centennial College 5th semester. Uber-Planetary is a 3D Space Narrative Taxi game where you play Furgust, an alien attempting to make enough cash to pay off a close friend's debt. Players will navigate a sandbox area picking up and dropping off customers while receiving all sorts of stories.

Credits:

Anton Shabalin: 3D-Modeller

Ben Ahunu-Kumi: UI Artist, Writer

Davi Sampaio: Programmer, UI artist

Daren Trinh: Programmer, 3D-Modeller

Rahul Poundarik: Programmer
